name: Give It Another Go
description: This is a little personal project, a game demonstration if you can call. It is highly inspired by The Stanley Parable. I can't really tell the demo is finished but it is somewhat playable in this state so I decided to share it with you guys. There is not much in terms of "game play" in this demo. It is more of a narrative game just like The Stanley Parable. I can't really tell about the story of the game without spoiling it. So if you are looking for a unique and short experience you might wanna give this game a try. I would really like to hear feedback from you. Tell me what you think and please let me know if you find any game breaking bugs. Thanks!
